attributes.action: To Reform The General Medical council's investigating process against doctors.
attributes.additional_details:
General Medical council  has shown significant discrepancies and discrimination against Doctor from Overseas . Number of cases where GMC it self admitted they have made grave errors and acknowledged the disproportionate number of  overseas medical graduates being penalised .
Public money and time being misused to prosecute doctors for various trivial , non clinical & managerial mishaps .
This not only a waste  of resources but take the healthcare professionals out of the frontline work.
attributes.background: The General Medical council's investigatory process should be made more transparent, simpler and with a proportionate response when comes to punishing doctors for trivial, non clinical and non patient related  issues.

rejection.details: This is a matter for General Medical Council, rather than the Government or Parliament. The GMC is entirely independent from the Government.
